name: Johnny Bazookatone
description:
Johnny Bazookatone is an arcade game developed by Arc Developments. It was originally released in 1995. U.S. Gold published the game. The game is rated as "Recommended" on RAWG.
Johnny Bazookatone is available on 3DO, SEGA Saturn, PlayStation and PC.
It was scored by Andi McGinty, Des Tong, Guitar by Mike Hehir and Sax by Snake Davis.
